Class RMIClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.classes.network.RMIClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientInterface, ModelViewEventVisitor

    public class RMIClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClientInterface, ModelViewEventVisitor
    Author:
    Andrea Folini intermediary between the client implementation and the interface handler
